TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRequiresSessionState

summary.span: 指定目標 HTTP 處理常式需要工作階段狀態值的讀取和寫入權限。

span.span: Specifies that the target HTTP handler requires read and write access to session-state values.

summary.span: 這是沒有方法的標記介面。

span.span: This is a marker interface and has no methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作在自訂 HTTP 處理常式來識別您的處理常式需要讀取和寫入 」 權限的工作階段狀態值的介面。Implement the interface in your custom HTTP handler to identify that your handler requires read and write access to session-state values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查目前的 HTTP屬性來判斷是否需要讀取和寫入 」 權限的工作階段狀態值。The following code example examines the current HTTP property to determine whether it requires read and write access to session-state values. [!code-csharp[HttpSessionState#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/snippetscs.aspx#32)] [!code-vb[HttpSessionState#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#32)]
